DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy BIOD-531 compare Humalog®Mix 75/25 patient type 2 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluating Safety Efficacy BIOD 531 Compared Humalog® Mix 75/25 Subjects With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: BIOD-531 formulation recombinant human insulin biphasic absorption profile characterize rapid absorption ( prevent meal-time rise blood glucose ) secondary longer ( basal ) phase . The purpose trial evaluate glucose control safety BIOD-531 compare pre-mixed insulin commonly use provide meal-time long acting insulin .
DOC.criteria: Established clinical diagnosis type 2 diabetes , consistent ADA classification criterion 6 month longer . Body Mass Index 27 45 kg/square meter , inclusive . Screening HbA1c 7.5 11.0 % , inclusive . Up two injection per day U100 basal ( NPH , glargine , detemir ) , premixed , selfmixed basal/prandial insulin insulin analog stable total daily dose 40 200 units/day , inclusive , ≥ 3 month prior screen . Regular use Humulin®R U500 sulfonylurea , exenatide ( shortacting ) , repaglinide , nateglinide within 1 month prior screen . History bariatric surgery . Subject one severe hypoglycemic episode associated seizure , coma , unconsciousness within past 6 month . History known hypersensitivity component study medication . New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) Class III IV functional capacity , unstable angina pectoris , myocardial infarction , severe peripheral vascular disease , ischemic stroke transient ischemic attack within 6 month screen . Systolic blood pressure ≥ 180 mmHg sit diastolic blood pressure ≥ 100 mmHg confirm repeat screen visit .
